original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl WHERE c.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.CommentCount<=18 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-23 07:27:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-09 01:43:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CommentCount <= 18 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-23 07:27:31' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 01:43:00')
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.OwnerUserId)
